<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<event>

    <host>host</host>
    <severity>SEVERE</severity>
    <uei>org.opennms.uei.serviceProblemAlarm</uei>
    <source>SPMInterface</source>
    <description>Hello first problem</description>
    <!-- <time>2020-04-08T04:47:37.331-04:00</time> -->
     <!--      <descr>this:descrYYY</descr> -->
    <logmsg>spm interface update.111</logmsg>
    <parms>
        <parm>
            <parmName>this:parmNameXXX</parmName>
            <value>this:value</value>
            <type>string</type>
        </parm>
    </parms>

</event>
